Based on your preferences, here are two movie recommendations that fit your criteria:
1. "Dinner for Schmucks" (2010): This classic romantic comedy stars Julia Stiles and Will Smith as the titular dinner guests. The film follows a struggling writer named Michael (Will Smith)) who is invited to a dinner party hosted by his boss, Mr. Jenkins (James Spader)). Michael has no money and is forced to borrow money from his friend and fellow dinner guest, Dora (Julia Stiles)), who has a bank account. Dora agrees to lend Michael the money he needs to buy food for himself and Dora at the dinner party. Michael happily accepts the loan from Dora and uses it to buy food for himself and Dora at the dinner party.
